title: Kathy Griffen Interview and More
itunes:title: Kathy Griffen Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Kathy Griffen stop by where she spoke about her documentary, being detained and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that tried to sneak cocaine under his toupée and Angela helped some listeners during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
